duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform routine and high-risk respiratory procedures as prescribed by the Physician and follow appropriate policy in the application of respiratory procedures.
Communicate with physicians on the effectiveness of respiratory care procedures.
Thoroughly explain and answer patient and family questions regarding respiratory care.
Review patients' charts to verify orders and check for contradictions of therapy.
Assess patients and provide proper documentation in patient's chart as related to therapy.
Assemble, install, disassemble, assess, and maintain equipment according to manufacturer and department policy.

education_certification.credential: Associate in Respiratory Therapy or Bachelor Degree in Respiratory Therapy is required
Registered Respiratory Therapist license in the state of practice
